text: The Russian Grand Prix () is an annual auto race held at Sochi Autodrom – a street circuit built around Olympic Park in Sochi, Russia, as part of the Formula One World Championship. The 2022 edition was cancelled due to 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine, before contract future race was terminated. == Winners == ===Repeat winners (drivers)=== Drivers in bold are competing in the Formula One championship in the current season. Wins Driver Years won 4 Lewis Hamilton 2014, 2015, 2018, 2019 ===Repeat winners (constructors)=== Teams in bold are competing in the Formula One championship in the current season. A pink background indicates an event which was not part of the Formula One World Championship. Wins Constructor Years won 8 / Benz/Mercedes 1913, 1914, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 ===Repeat winners (engine manufacturers)=== Manufacturers in bold are competing in the Formula One championship in the current season. A pink background indicates an event which was not part of the Formula One World Championship. Wins Manufacturer Years won 8 / Benz/Mercedes 1913, 1914, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 ===By year=== A pink background indicates an event which was not part of the Formula One World Championship.
